import React from 'react'; import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import validate from './LoginFormValidation'; import TextField from '../elements/TextField'; import Label from '../elements/Label'; import Button from '../elements/Button'; const LoginForm = ({ handleSubmit, isLoginFailed,isEmailCorrect,isPasswordCorrect }) => (
handleSubmit(e)}>

{/* /row */}
) export default reduxForm({ form: 'login', validate, })(LoginForm)
